entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
